item.title: 普利司通任命森田为首席执行官，负责恢复增长
item.description: 普利司通公司（Bridgestone Corp.）任命森田康弘（Yasuhiro Morita）为首席执行官，接替石桥秀一（Shuichi Ishibashi），目标是到 2031 年重新夺回全球第一大轮胎制造商的地位。【原文：Bridgestone Corp. named Yasuhiro Morita as chief executive officer to succeed Shuichi Ishibashi, with a stated aim to reclaim its position as the world’s No. 1 tiremaker by 2031.】

item.title: 法国 10 月商业信心指数意外走高
item.description: 受制造业和零售业改善的推动，法国 10 月份的商业信心指数意外走高。【原文：French business confidence unexpectedly inched higher in October, driven by improvements in the manufacturing and retail sectors.】

item.title: 日本工会在即将举行的薪酬谈判中寻求至少 5%的工资涨幅
item.description: 日本最大的工会联合会将在明年的工资谈判中继续寻求至少 5%的工资涨幅，因为新首相高市真奈试图保持日本的工资增长势头。【原文：Japan’s largest labor union federation will keep seeking at least a 5% wage hike in next year’s pay talks, as new Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi attempts to keep the country’s wage momentum going.】

item.title: 美国关税损害货运市场，DSV 警告将进一步削减成本
item.description: 全球最大的货运代理公司 DSV A/S 下调了利润预期区间的上限，并表示由于关税开始对运输市场造成损害，该公司可能不得不进一步削减成本。【原文：DSV A/S, the world’s largest freight forwarder, lowered the top end of its profit forecast range and said it may have to make deeper cost cuts as tariffs are starting to hurt the transport market.】

item.title: 北美强劲的消费需求提升了联合利华的销售额
item.description: 受发达市场（尤其是北美）需求强劲和公司节约成本努力的推动，联合利华公司第三季度的销售额增幅超过预期。【原文：Unilever Plc sales rose more than expected in the third quarter, driven by strong demand in developed markets, particularly North America, and the company’s cost-saving efforts.】

item.title: 中国找到代价高昂的新方法来扩展习近平的全球人民币政策
item.description: 中国正在利用其世界最大债权国的地位，帮助扩大人民币的使用范围，为海外借款人提供机会，让他们通过放弃美元，从国内经济低迷的利率中获益。【原文：China is leveraging its position as the world’s largest creditor to help broaden usage of the yuan, offering overseas borrowers the chance to benefit from economically-depressed interest rates at home by ditching the dollar.】

item.title: 报告称南非面临空中交通管制员危机
item.description: 南非空中交通管制人员短缺，"几乎影响到 "管理国家空域的国有公司 "提供的服务"。【原文：South Africa’s shortage of air-traffic controllers is “almost compromising service delivery” by the state-owned company that manages the nation’s airspace.】

item.title: 英镑下跌，富时 100 指数期货持稳
印尼改变策略，争取银行增加贷款，促进经济增长
item.description: 印尼央行正在改变支持经济的策略，这表明货币政策正在失效。【原文：Bank Indonesia is changing tack in its bid to support the economy, signaling that monetary policy is failing to deliver.】

item.title: 必和必拓不顾 CMRG 限制向中国买家出售铁矿石货物
item.description: 本周，必和必拓集团向中国贸易商出售了几批铁矿石货物，尽管与中国强大的国有买家之间的争端有可能干扰这家全球最大矿商向其主要市场发货。【原文：BHP Group sold several iron ore cargoes to Chinese traders this week, despite a dispute with the nation’s powerful state buyer that risks disrupting shipments from the world’s largest miner to its main market.】

item.title: 诺基亚因网络增长利润超过预期
item.description: 得益于网络基础设施和光网络业务的增长，诺基亚公司第三季度调整后利润超出预期。【原文：Nokia Oyj’s adjusted profit for the third quarter beat estimates, thanks to growth in its network infrastructure and optical networks businesses.】

item.title: 空客、莱昂纳多和泰雷兹达成合并卫星业务协议
item.description: 莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）、空中客车公司（Airbus SE）和泰雷兹公司（Thales SA）达成了一项期待已久的协议，将合并它们的卫星业务，成立一家欧洲合资企业，希望与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）一较高下。【原文：Leonardo SpA, Airbus SE and Thales SA sealed a long-awaited agreement to merge their satellite operations and create a European joint venture that aspires to compete with Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 意法半导体（STMicro）销售额预测低于预期，芯片复苏停滞不前
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）预测第四季度营收不及分析师预期，加剧了市场对成熟半导体行业复苏停滞的担忧。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV forecast fourth-quarter revenue that missed analysts’ expectations, fueling concerns that the mature semiconductor industry’s recovery is stalling.】

item.title: 韩国房地产反弹不断，央行保持警惕
item.description: 韩国中央银行决定在等待政府住房措施冷却需求的同时不降低利率，这进一步增强了韩国房地产市场的反弹势头。【原文：South Korea’s property market rally gained further momentum, reinforcing a decision by the central bank to refrain from lowering interest rates as it waits for government housing measures to cool demand.】

item.title: 雷诺第三季度收入因汽车销售和金融业务而增长
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司第三季度的销售额增长了 6.8%，这主要得益于对达契亚 Bigster 等新车型的需求以及公司金融服务部门收入的增加。【原文：Renault SA’s third-quarter sales gained 6.8%, helped by demand for new models such as the Dacia Bigster as well as higher revenue at the company’s financial services arm.】

item.title: 麦肯锡称银行利润可能面临 1700 亿美元的人工智能冲击
item.description: 如果银行不调整业务模式，以应对客户转向人工智能来优化财务状况的需求，那么它们的底线将面临高达 1700 亿美元的冲击。【原文：Banks face a hit to their bottom lines of as much as $170 billion if they don’t adapt their business models to respond to customers turning to artificial intelligence to optimize their finances.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率因交通和医疗保健而上升
item.description: 在公共交通和医疗保健成本的带动下，新加坡的主要通胀指标在连续两个月下降后，9 月份略有加快。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge rose at a slightly faster pace in September after two months of deceleration, led by public transport and healthcare costs.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将与中国达成协议后大豆走高
item.description: 美国大豆期货周四走高，此前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他有信心在下周与中国总统在韩国会晤时达成贸易协议，包括农产品采购协议。【原文：US soybean futures edged higher on Thursday after US President Donald Trump said he was confident of striking a trade deal with his Chinese counterpart when they meet in South Korea next week, including an agreement on agricultural purchases.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯石油巨头的制裁在中国引发震动
item.description: 美国对俄罗斯能源巨头的制裁正向中国石油工业的心脏深处发起冲击波，中国的国有和私营炼油企业都面临着更大的压力，既要保证供应，又要避免受到处罚。【原文：US sanctions on Russia’s energy giants are sending shockwaves deep into the heart of China’s oil industry, where both state and private refiners face heightened pressure to keep up supplies while steering clear of penalties.】

item.title: 不要为高市哭泣，但要为阿根廷前进
item.description:
日本有了一个新的机会来做好很多事情。米莱的美国之桥将一事无成。【原文：

Japan has a new chance to get a lot of things right. Milei’s US bridge is going nowhere.

】

item.title: 欧洲气候议程面临经济现实的考验
item.description:
欧盟领导人需要找到一种方法来减轻企业和消费者在绿色转型过程中的成本负担，同时保持对气候问题的关注。【原文：

EU leaders need to find a way to ease the cost burden of the green transition for companies and consumers while keeping climate ambition intact.

】

item.title: 为何热议 AGI？它到底是什么？
item.description:
人工智能公司正在竞相创造人工通用智能，并将其视为重塑经济和社会的 "智能爆炸 "的催化剂。如果他们能就 AGI 的实际模样和实现方式达成一致，那该有多好

。【原文：

AI companies are in a race to create artificial general intelligence, seeing it as the catalyst for an “intelligence explosion” that reshapes the economy and society. If only they could agree on what AGI would actually look like, and how it might be achieved

】

item.title: 华沙证券交易所希望升级为发达市场
item.description: 华沙证券交易所首席执行官 Tomasz Bardzilowski 表示，华沙证券交易所希望在三到五年内摆脱新兴市场地位，升级为发达市场。【原文：The Warsaw Stock Exchange eyes ditching its emerging-market status and an upgrade to developed markets within three to five years, according to Chief Executive Officer Tomasz Bardzilowski.】

item.title: 土耳其央行观察家对降息押注意见不一
item.description: 土耳其预计将在周四坚持其降息周期，但经济学家对央行将在多大程度上放宽借贷成本存在分歧，此前通胀率意外攀升，政治骚乱令投资者惶恐不安。【原文：Turkey is expected to stick to its interest-rate cut cycle on Thursday, but economists are split on how much the central bank will ease borrowing costs, after inflation unexpectedly climbed and political commotion left investors on edge.】

item.title: 英格兰银行将在资金紧张的情况下迁移金融监管机构
item.description: 英格兰银行正计划将其银行监管部门迁出摩尔盖特办公室，在居家办公、资金紧张和租房成本上升的情况下，缩减其在伦敦金融城的存在。【原文：The Bank of England is planning to move its banking regulation arm out of its Moorgate office, slimming down its presence in the City of London at a time of homeworking, tight finances and the rising cost of renting space.】

item.title: 印度央行捍卫卢比后，印度债券吸引全球投资者
item.description: 上周，外国投资者将印度政府债券的购买量提高了 46 倍，这表明印度央行积极的货币干预措施正在建立市场信心。【原文：Foreign investors ramped up purchases of Indian government bonds by 46 times last week, an indication that aggressive currency intervention by the central bank is building market confidence.】

item.title: 达纳塔拉聘用前新加坡政府投资公司高管领导私人市场推进工作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度尼西亚主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）已聘请两名前新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte.【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara has hired two former GIC Pte. investment professionals to lead its global private market coverage, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛认为近期不会出现熊市，铜走高
item.description: 在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）指出交易商近期看涨后，铜价走高，因为价格仍接近创纪录水平。【原文：Copper edged higher after Goldman Sachs Group Inc. pointed to a near-term bullish view among traders, as prices remain close to a record.】

item.title: 消息称俄罗斯对印度的石油供应量将降至近乎零
item.description: 据炼油厂高级管理人员称，在美国对原油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）实施制裁后，预计流向印度主要加工商的俄罗斯石油量将降至近乎零。【原文：Flows of Russian oil to major Indian processors are expected to fall to near zero after US sanctions on crude giants Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC, according to senior refinery executives.】

item.title: 接受 Covid mRNA 注射的癌症患者生存期显著延长
item.description: 曾帮助遏制 Covid-19 大流行的诺贝尔获奖 mRNA 技术或许也将改变癌症治疗。【原文：The same Nobel-winning mRNA technology that helped curb the Covid-19 pandemic may be poised to transform cancer care.】
